vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.12.10;
son of: Joshua (H3091J);
father of: Eliashib (H0475N)
§ Joiakim or Jehoiakim = "Jehovah raises up"
a priest and son of Jeshua the high priest
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約雅金 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華高舉"
大祭司耶書亞的兒子，也是祭司
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约雅金 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华高举"
大祭司耶书亚的儿子，也是祭司
